data.text: @hamlllton @fckinbee @Lin_Manuel Was gonna use the Moana one but wanted to avoid GIF overuse 😊Glad you enjoyed. https://t.co/UZyifYkVkW
@mesouthgate @fckinbee @Lin_Manuel Larson is such an inspiration. This whole little thread you wrote here is absolutely lovely, Martha. Thank you for it.
.@hamlllton @fckinbee Oops. And I missed the @ before Lin's name above. So looking at you too, @Lin_Manuel. Also your NYT piece about Larson made me cry.
.@hamlllton @fckinbee @JesseKGreen His too-soon death always be a tragedy and unrecoverable loss.But I know he's looking down,smiling at his legacy.We should all be so lucky.
.@hamlllton @fckinbee And my daughter,who played Lexi Darling (brilliantly😊@JesseKGreen was parent at her school.Loved her.Humblebragging about kid is OK,right?)😊
But the greatest thing about RENT is how it continues to inspire generations.I'm looking at you, @hamlllton & @fckinbee and Lin_Manuel
"That was the moment I knew that this had to be my life.And now here I am."I am excited about this broadcast.I hope it's great.
The guy who played Mark thanked us and then pointed into the audience and said "When I was 12,I sat right there and saw this show.
Though I'm JL's age,it was the Hamilton of its time and tix were impossible.I took my son-it was Kids Night on B'way so actors made a speech
